item.title: [DISTRELEC-6341] Auto-apply filter
item.description:
Rename to “Auto-update results”

Include information layer next to it “Tick the box if you would like to automatically update the search results as soon as a filter is selected” (see screenshot)

Laura will check for translations with Sam.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Please test after the next deployment
Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6336] Incorrect tax note/ price on cart fly out
item.description:
B2B: Prices excl. taxes
B2C: Prices incl. taxes

The tax note in the cart fly out should be related to the customer channel B2B or B2C.

Also the displayed price should be customer related (incl. or excl. taxes)
item.summary: Incorrect tax note/ price on cart fly out

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6272] Test // PL, DK, SE, NO, LV, EE, NL // please configure the test accounts to be connected to the common Evo Payments Test account
item.description:
as tests start on Monday, please configure all the new sites:
PL, DK, SE, NO, LV, EE, NL

based on their payment options.

If some options are not activated, skip it for now (EG Ideal)
item.summary: Test // PL, DK, SE, NO, LV, EE, NL // please configure the test accounts to be connected to the common Evo Payments Test account

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Oana,
Do you have any exact data like ID's?
Test account is the same account, one and only for Evo Payment. Please use the general merchant id

All setings are done!

I have a question though ERP code for payment with CreditCard in new sap is "CreditCard" instead of "004_CreditCard" which was used in old elfa sap.
Can you confirm this with SAP team , if this is correct then settings are done?

Hi Neeraj

you can always test the credit card payment with the guest order. I also do not have test users for these sites yet

So I tested the Pl site, and no, it does not work yet.

regards

After addition of PLN,SEK,DKK,NOk from evo payment I tested payment from test env it was working.
Please test it now. Thanks

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6265] CH P // Issue with Order Status Interface
item.description:
User: mbuergis

Order: 0034QMM5

 

In Movex, order status is 22 – not delivered.

In shop – order status is green – received

 

 

 

 

 

User e-mail oft eh affected person: [1]michel.buergisser@swissonline.ch
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[1] michel.buergisser@swissonline.ch
item.summary: CH P // Issue with Order Status Interface

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Oana
This is what I got from Movex last Friday January 30th:
0034QMM5;01;20150118233855

01 = Received

Received means not shippped.
Received means Distrelec has received the order.

Hi Florian

does this mean that we should write: 'Distrelec has received the order' ?

does this mean that 'Erhalten' is a wrong text?

thanks
Yes it looks like.
We'll change it to "Created"

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6251] PIM Import - Autoremove empty categories
item.description:
Issue:
Empty categories need to be deleted manually, this will get time-consuming in the future.

Requierement:
Adapt Masterimport to check for empty categories when the import finished and automatically delete obsolete categories.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
should be available after next deployment on Q. To test this, go to the hac ( http://10.191.21.141:9001/hac/console/flexsearch ) and run the following scrip:

SELECT count({pk}) FROM {Category!}
  WHERE {pk} NOT IN
  (
    {{
      SELECT {source} FROM {CategoryCategoryRelation!}
    }}
  )
  AND {pk} NOT IN
  (
    {{
      SELECT {source} FROM {CategoryProductRelation!}
    }}
  )

the expected result is zero.

Note: please note that to avoid infinite loops, we limited the search to 3 steps which means that sometimes the result will not be zero.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6248] Eastern Countries // Wrong Movex Payment Codes
item.description:
It seems we are giving the wrong payment method codes to Movex for the Czech Republic - www.distrelec.cz
At the moment "000" is transfered to Movex for Credit Card payment.
It should be 020 for Visa and 021 for MasterCard.

Please also check the other eastern countries.
item.summary: Eastern Countries // Wrong Movex Payment Codes

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Florian,

I applied a fix last week and Hoping this will fix the issue in the production. However I did the testing in the test env. Here it seems to working fine, Attached the screenshot as well.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6117] When modifying email or password at "Login-daten" ther is no confirmation
item.description:
Distrelec AT

When a user enters his My Account sectioon and goes to Login-data tab to change his email or password preferences he will receive no confirmation of success if the change is done properly or not. Neither "green-pop-up" nor email confirmation.

https://www.distrelec.at/my-account/login-data
item.summary: When modifying email or password at "Login-daten" ther is no confirmation

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Rafael,
can you involve someone from BE to have a look?
Thanks
Please have a look when you have time, thx.

Hi there,
This is not only for password update, it is also for the entire process like update profile, add email, etc...
Please review.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6080] DE // Existing Customer Registration
item.description:
Hi,
we have again the problem with registration of existing customers.. I copy everything what i need to registrate the customer from SAP and close the Customer in SAP before i write the captcha and finish the registration. However i have again and again the same message in webshop: " Bitte korrigieren SIe nachfolgende Fehler". See attached screenshots.. What is the reason for this issue?

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Wil
Could you please check?
Maybe it has something to do with the UID "Tax number" validation.
Problem is not reproducable on Q and local env. Asked Önder to open HP ticket for a user account on P for me. When this task is done, I can do my analysis on P and solve the problem.

The following exception is the problem on P:

30 Dec 2014 12:14:05 WARN  [hybrisHTTP100] [10.191.16.10] [AbstractRegisterPageController] Registration failed!
com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.service.exception.NotFoundException: DistDepartmentModel with code [9999] not found!
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.service.codelist.dao.impl.DefaultDistrelecCodelistDao.getDistrelecCodelistEntry(DefaultDistrelecCodelistDao.java:44)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.service.codelist.impl.DefaultDistrelecCodelistService.getDistDepartment(DefaultDistrelecCodelistService.java:357)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.inout.erp.impl.SapCustomerService.updateContactLocal(SapCustomerService.java:467)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.inout.erp.impl.SapCustomerService.updateContactDetails(SapCustomerService.java:328)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.inout.erp.impl.SapCustomerService.updateCustomerFromReadCustomerResponse(SapCustomerService.java:308)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.inout.erp.impl.SapCustomerService.readCustomer(SapCustomerService.java:114)
        at com.namics.distrelec.erpabstraction.inout.erp.impl.RoutingCustomerService.readCustomer(RoutingCustomerService.java:46)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.service.customer.impl.DefaultDistCustomerAccountService.registerExisting(DefaultDistCustomerAccountService.java:139)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.facades.customer.impl.DefaultDistCustomerFacade.registerExistingB2B(DefaultDistCustomerFacade.java:325)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.storefront.controllers.pages.AbstractRegisterPageController.processExistingB2BRegisterUserRequest(AbstractRegisterPageController.java:440)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.storefront.controllers.pages.RegisterExistingPageController.doRegisterExistingB2B(RegisterExistingPageController.java:123)
        at sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor3521.invoke(Unknown Source)
        at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)

I will solve it now.

In the registration form is no department selected, but we get from SAP the department with code "9999" for this customer. This department does not exist in hybris. Thats why the registration fails. We should correct it in SAP.

I try now to complete the registration with selected department, as a workaround.

Its still not possible to register this existing user. We run in the same exception as before:

30 Dec 2014 12:45:55 WARN  [hybrisHTTP44] [10.191.16.10] [AbstractRegisterPageController] Registration failed!
com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.service.exception.NotFoundException: DistDepartmentModel with code [9999] not found!
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.service.codelist.dao.impl.DefaultDistrelecCodelistDao.getDistrelecCodelistEntry(DefaultDistrelecCodelistDao.java:44)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.service.codelist.impl.DefaultDistrelecCodelistService.getDistDepartment(DefaultDistrelecCodelistService.java:357)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.inout.erp.impl.SapCustomerService.updateContactLocal(SapCustomerService.java:467)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.inout.erp.impl.SapCustomerService.updateContactDetails(SapCustomerService.java:328)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.inout.erp.impl.SapCustomerService.updateCustomerFromReadCustomerResponse(SapCustomerService.java:308)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.inout.erp.impl.SapCustomerService.readCustomer(SapCustomerService.java:114)
        at com.namics.distrelec.erpabstraction.inout.erp.impl.RoutingCustomerService.readCustomer(RoutingCustomerService.java:46)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.service.customer.impl.DefaultDistCustomerAccountService.registerExisting(DefaultDistCustomerAccountService.java:139)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.facades.customer.impl.DefaultDistCustomerFacade.registerExistingB2B(DefaultDistCustomerFacade.java:325)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.storefront.controllers.pages.AbstractRegisterPageController.processExistingB2BRegisterUserRequest(AbstractRegisterPageController.java:440)
        at com.namics.distrelec.b2b.storefront.controllers.pages.RegisterExistingPageController.doRegisterExistingB2B(RegisterExistingPageController.java:123)

Please change this in SAP accordingly.

Hi Wil, Hi Evangelos. The only thing that is inactive "9999" In SAP is one contact person, not the complete account of the company. The contact person that i want to registrate is NOT inactive. We have more and more customers that can´t registrate themselves and also complaints of these customers.

Hello Florian,
As we discuss yesterday, this seems to be like a duplicate ticket

Hi Urs

I discussed with Evangelos and he advised me to assign this to you.
please take a look asap, as Zisan is wating for a solution since 6 weeks now!

thanks

Hi Florian
As discussed the value 9999 CP inactive is set to mark a contact as inactive and is used also for the CRM.
Could you set up this value in the shop too but not as a selection for the users. A contact with this value should not be displayed in the shop.

Hi Urs,
As we have discussed.
I think this is not the correct solution for the issue.

We are implementing a specific error message for this case at the moment. But we should not deactivate any customers through department codes. Instead we should modify the interface if the option is needed to deactivate any customers.

As discussed with Urs we'll solve it in two phases.
1. Web Shop is ignoring department 9999 and the customer we'll be able to register --> Release W7
2. PI we'll send us department 9999 as dedicated deactivation flag. Web Shop will show a warning message to customer during the login.
Nabil could you please check again?

Hi Nabil,
For the workaround please name it:
EN: Inactive Customer
DE. Inaktiver Kunde

and place it on the last position.
I created a department with code 9999 on P. This department is used only as work around until next deployment on P.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-5900] Changed URL structure causing search results in logfiles
item.description:
After having got a significant amount of numeric searches, Angel and I realised that the link structure has been changed (or we assume so), so that there is always a ?q=XYZ repeating the query when you come to the detail page.

My assumption is that these tags add up to the logfile analysis and that we therefore have higher figures in the analysis, especially in the article number searches.

Is there a possibility to have a different structure? I assume it has to do with the fact that you want to get back to the right search result page, but if there is any possibility, we would be very glad.
item.summary: Changed URL structure causing search results in logfiles

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Daniela
could we have a meeting to discuss about this ticket.
I dont get the point.

Thank you
What's the status here?
I've implemented the fix to add log=internal for every search generated by the pagination page in product detail page. The internal log must be configured in FF accordingly.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6339] All new ELFA countries// Confirmation e-mail after Register Existing Customer - does not work
item.description:
Testers use the distrelec.testing account

according the HMC manual, users should receve an e-mail after Existing Customer Registration in order that they set-up the password. Nothing was received in the distrelec.testing account.

Activations in HMC Q were done.
item.summary: All new ELFA countries// Confirmation e-mail after Register Existing Customer - does not work

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment:
Hi Oana
the email has been sent correctly but only this morning (feb 6) at 10:14.

The hybris process to forward the request to SMTP server has been completed yesterday afternoon (feb 5 at )So from webshop side there is no issue.

To understand the reason of the delay we have to involve HP

Hi Önder

We are unable to receive e-mails for a type of registration.

According to Francesco, the e-mail was sent by hybris.

please investigate

Hi Francesco, could you please give me more Details:

  • only issue with .ee and .nl?
  • only tested with gmail as customer?

For me Looks wired in the Moment since we have not changed anything at HP on Q.

Thx, Önder

Hi Oender
For this specific issue we're taking about the NL website for customer distrelec.testing gmail account.
I've tested another time with the same conditions and the email has been delivered immediately.
So it seems that the problem is happening from time to time.

Oana Ilie | Distrelec do you have some more details about the frequency of this behavior?
For me it looks not like a Network issue :/ (all the Domains are running in the same Network, so the behaviour should be everywhere if it's a natwork issue)

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6290] SE Test // Postal Code for Sweden is 6 caracthers (123 space 45)
item.description:
Shop validation is 5 digits - correct.

SAP validation is 6 digits - incorrect
item.summary: SE Test // Postal Code for Sweden is 6 caracthers (123 space 45)

status.description: This issue was once resolved, but the resolution was deemed incorrect. From here issues are either marked assigned or resolved.

comments.comment: this is teh case for B2B & B2C

formatting of the Postal Code is 123 45

there is space between character 3 and 4.
So 6 would be correct then.
Please review
tested. it does not work

Hi Oana

There are 3 possible formats for the postal code in SE.

SE-XXX XX
S-XXX XX
XXX XX

Our head office in SE is using SE-XXX XX.
So we asssume that we have to use this format right?
Please review
according to SAP team, XXX XX

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6356] FF campaigns should be able to steer "category searches"
item.description:
We should be able to display FF campaigns also when a search category is selected.

I tried with setting the parameter categoryRestrictions=cat-L1D_379509 but this does not work.

I realized that when selecting another filter/category after doing the search, this parameter switches to filter_Category1=Komponenten

We would need to have this filter parameter from the start in order to be able to display the campaigns from FF. Could this be possible?

I.e. instead of categoryRestrictions=XYZ it's filter_Category1=XYZ
item.summary: FF campaigns should be able to steer "category searches"

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-6355] Display of FF campaigns
item.description: I just noticed this morning that FF campaigns now are shown both above and below the search result list in Q. I don't know if that is due to some work in progress, but this should in any case not go live.

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
